content.title: Upcoming Presentations
description: ​Professionalism in the Age of Social Media: Relevance, Reliability, and Referability on LinkedIn

Join attorney Andy Brownstein and LinkedIn trainer/consultant Marc W. Halpert as they discuss LinkedIn best practices for lawyers that encourage user interaction and conversation on the platform while portraying your professional persona and law firm in a positive professional light.
​Balancing the Scales: Practical Stress Management for Lawyers

Missed the live broadcast? Stream this presentation in which attorney, author, and mental health advocate Lynn Garson explores the impact of stress on lawyers’ mental health and explores tools for managing stress, as well as resources for obtaining assistance. This presentation is approved for one hour of competence issues MCLE credit in California.

content.title: Recent Recordings
description: ​How Laws Get Online: Challenges in Free Law

Still need CLE credit? As a Justia Connect Pro, you can broadcast our recent presentation with Sara Frug and Craig Newton, Co-Directors of the Legal Information Institute at Cornell Law School, exploring the nuances of codifying federal statutes and regulations, as well as key issues regarding how and when governments place private works into the public domain. This presentation is accredited for one hour of general MCLE credit in California.
